It has never been my weakness to exalt the flesh - far from it.

sentence.Network_en: Still you exalt yourself against My people by not letting them go.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin exaltare, from ex- 'out, upward' + altus 'high'

entry.def: To exalt someone or something means to praise them very highly.

example.ex: However difficult she might have been, this book exalts her as both mother and muse...
example.tran: 尽管她可能很难相处，这本书还是对她给予了高度赞扬，称她既是母亲又是诗人。

example.ex: His work exalts all those virtues that we, as Americans, are taught to hold dear.
example.tran: 他的作品颂扬了所有那些身为美国人应该珍视的美德。

means.word_mean: 2. fill with sublime emotion; tickle pink (exhilarate is obsolete in this usage);

sentences.sentence: "The children were thrilled at the prospect of going to the movies"
"He was inebriated by his phenomenal success"

means.word_mean: 4. raise in rank, character, or status;

sentences.sentence: "exalted the humble shoemaker to the rank of King's adviser"

auth_sentence.content: Their purpose was to exalt the saint, never mind the evidence.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Their purpose was to exalt the saint, never mind the evidence.

auth_sentence.content: He insisted on reaching past partisan and regional divides to exalt our common humanity.
auth_sentence.res_content: He insisted on reaching past partisan and regional divides to exalt our common humanity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He insisted on reaching past partisan and regional divides to exalt our common humanity.

stems_affixes.word_buile: alt高+o音乐术语→n.高音 adj.高音的
exalt[v.使升高]+ed……的→升高了的→高贵的
alt高+itude表名词→n.高度,海拔;[n.]高处,高地
alt高+o音乐术语→n.高音 adj.高音的

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"出,出去"; 2. 表示"前面的,前任的"

stems_affixes.word_buile: ex出,出去+orbit圆圈,轨道+ant……的→出轨的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 详述的,明确的;坦率的;显然的
stems_affixes.word_buile: ex出,出去+pli重叠+cit→把重叠的东西弄出
ex出,出去+port港口→出港口→出口
ex出,出去+port港口→出港口→出口

stems_affixes.value_cn: 交换, 调换, 兑换, 交流, 交易
stems_affixes.word_buile: ex出,出去+change改变,兑换→变换出去→交换, 调换
ex出,出去+pand扩散→v. 扩张;张开, 发展
ex出,出去+purg纯洁,冲洗+ate做→冲洗出来→净化
ex出,出去+clud关闭+e→关出去→排外

sentences.en: The manager exalted many of his friends.

sentences.en: She thanked the President to exalt her.
